question.title: Rendering creatures without server-side Minecraft Geckolib
question.body:
I am writing a server for vanilla minecraft without using server mods. Now I want to write a mod that would replace the model rendering of regular mobs with my unique Blockbench model only with client side.

All I found was RenderLivingEvent.Pre event. How can I replace a regular mob model (e.g. by nickname via Component) with a unique one using GeckoLib ?

I was trying to cancel the rendering of a vanilla mob and run a custom render on that entity. I was expecting that the LivingEntityRenderState from the RenderLivingEvent.Pre event could be used as a GeoRanderState to start rendering a Geckolib model
